strapiPost.title: Tickets On Sale For BGO's Chefs In The Garden Fundraiser
strapiPost.content:
Chefs in the Garden, the Botanical Garden of the Ozarks' signature spring fundraiser, is back by popular demand for its 15th year, taking place May 23 from 5-8:30p.

  • Food and flowers: Stroll through the garden while sipping wine, beer, and ciders and sampling delicious creations prepared by the area's finest chefs as they demonstrate their craft.
  • Sharing the love: The event is 21+, and proceeds will support the Botanical Garden of the Ozarks, with a portion of each ticket sale also benefitting the Northwest Arkansas Food Bank.

Tickets sell out every year, so get yours while they last HERE!
